name: Call Bonded Item
summary: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.
description:
You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand. If your bonded item is 1 Bulk or less, you teleport your bonded item into your hand from up to 1 mile away.Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

Conjuration: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the conjuration school of magic, typically involving summoning, creation, teleportation, or moving things from place to place.Teleportation: Teleportation effects allow you to instantaneously move from one point in space to another. Teleportation does not usually trigger reactions based on movement.
